Text:
Exmnova..it has been a pleasure enjoying your videos but as im in UK and tpb is soon to be blocked it shall be no more.....

I will come back here later and would be forever greatful if you can leave a link to where ever you get your rips from, i heard its a russian site but im not sure...again thanks my friend..
Just add 8.8.8.8 to your DNS setting, and you will probably be able to access TPB in the future too.
